divs: Sighting DetailsWent to backyard at 5:16am for fresh air. Could not sleep. Looked up and observed solid glowing object moving very fast directly toward South. No blinking lights. No Sound. Covered 50+ miles until not visible within under 1 minute. Slight path alteration in what appeared to be altitude but speed seemed constant. Definitely not an airplane or helicopter.
Summary: Bright star-like object non pulsating moving at very fast speed covering about 50 miles in under 1 minute
